title: The Obama Fixer is Back! (Ep 1189)
description:
In this episode, I address the troubling reappearance of Barack Obama’s “fixer” in yet another case involving an Obama-era scandal. I also address Bernie Sanders’ troubling inability to call out socialist tyrannies. Finally, I address a media hack’s continued efforts to defend the Swamp. 

News Picks:

Why does this Obama era lawyer keep appearing in prominent scandals? 

The FBI has a lot of explaining to do in the continuing strange case of Joseph Mifsud. 


Bernie Sanders cannot stop saying positive things about socialist regimes. 


The untimely death of Phil Haney has not been ruled a suicide.


AOC’s congressional seat may go bye-bye. 

This is getting real now. We should all be afraid of Bernie Sanders.

There goes Florida. Socialist Bernie Sanders is a disaster for the Democrats.
